metadata.title: CVE-2024-6501 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - low
metadata.description: A flaw was found in NetworkManager. When a system running NetworkManagerwith DEBUG logs enabled and an interface eth1 configured with LLDP enabled,a malicious user could inject a malformed LLDP packet. NetworkManager wouldcrash, leading to a denial of service.

criterions.comment: network-manager package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
